DOC.brief_summary: Patients who complete study T1249-102 (must be currently failing a T-20 containing regimen to participate in this study) will receive T-1249 at a dose of 200mg daily in combination with a background antiretroviral regimen for 96 weeks. Only patients that participated in study T1249-102 can participate in study T1249-105.
DOC.brief_title: A Rollover Study to Provide Chronic T-1249 to Patients Who Completed Study T1249-102
DOC.criteria: Completion T1249102; Currently failing a T20 containing regimen Noncompletion of T1249102.
